text: No one honestly believes Millie Bobby Brown runs over gay men with new cars. Just like no one honestly believes Millie Bobby Brown throws piping hot McCafés at people who wear pride T - shirts at McDonald ’ s. Just like no one honestly believes that Millie Bobby Brown bullies gay men by sliding into their texts and dropping f - bombs ( the one that rhymes with maggots ). But what people don ’ t believe doesn ’ t really matter, as Millie Bobby Brown, the 14 - year - old star of Netflix ’ s Stranger Things, deactivated her Twitter account this week, reportedly in response to assertions like these. These claims are part of the # TakeDownMillieBobbyBrown meme, which consists of low - effort pictures — usually screengrabs from Brown
